body.directions: Listen to the audio, then complete the multiple choice questions that follow.

body.quiz: Which of the following is not a family role belonging to the word in the audio?
body.answer: Audio for 谢谢 xièxiè
options: Audio for 弟弟 dìdi
Audio for 妹妹 mèimei
Audio for 姐姐 jiějie
body.correct: Excellently done! 家 jiā means “family” or “home,” and 谢谢 xièxiè (thanks) is obviously not a role in it, like 弟弟 dìdi (younger brother) or 妹妹 mèimei (younger sister)—even though they are all duplicated words (the words with the same character(s) repeating).
body.incorrect: Very close. Listen to all the words in the options, which have similar sounds, and try to differentiate them and find their meanings.

body.quiz: Which of the following sentences can be completed with the word in the audio?
body.correct: Outstanding job! 姐姐 jiějie means older sister, and you can use the verb 有 yǒu (to have) to form a sentence. “我有一个姐姐。 Wǒ yǒu yīgè jiějie. I have an older sister.”
body.incorrect: So close! Listen to the audio again, and understand the word’s meaning. Then review all the structures in the options and see which one it fits.

body.quiz: Which of the following words have the same initial in its pinyin as the word in the audio?
body.correct: Outstanding job! The word 哥哥 gēge (older brother) has initial “g,” while the word 苹果 píngguǒ (apple) also has the initial “g” for its 2nd character.
body.incorrect: Not quite… listen to the word in the audio again, and identify its initial. Then sound out the words in the options to see which one has the same initial.

body.quiz: Which of the following words does not serve the same purpose in a sentence as the word in the audio?
body.correct: Excellently done! The word 谁 shéi (who) is used to form a question. Words 什么 shénme (what), 多少 duōshǎo (how many), and 哪里 nǎlǐ (where) are also used to form a question.
body.incorrect: Not quite… listen to the word in the audio again, and think about how it can be used in a sentence. Then review the choices to identify the one that doesn’t belong.
